message:
- browser version
- gruntfile for wpe.js and wpe.min.js
removed dependency to request module (because it is so huge)
added error to texture source callback

- add texture source format options
- texture process: prevent having to pre-process data
- use image data directly (awaiting node-canvas pull request https://github.com/Automattic/node-canvas/pull/907)

- use latest wpe-webgl with fixes for node v 7.7.2
- version bump (release separate nodejs texture process option)
use https instead of ssh for git

- renderAsTexture: bugfix
- nodejs fix (wpe-webgl)
- shader garbage collection
fixes for running WPE in Nodejs on Raspbian
refactor(rename): rename 'wpe' to 'wuf' because WPEFramework also adds a 'native' wpe component
fix(nodejs): update node-canvas dependency to the latest version, awaiting pull request https://github.com/Automattic/node-canvas/pull/1256
feat(node): Split up nodejs support to Lightning-node repository
feat(dist): auto-generate latest dist after install
fix(dependencies): don't depend on closure compiler
fix(texture throttling): when textures are loaded 'sync', during the update loop, load them immediately in order to give process width/height.

1.2.0

Features:
* added support for button longpress

Fixes:
* fixed circular dependency warnings upon install
* fireAncestors() method is no longer called on component that emits it

Removed hard test dependencies (#61)

* Removed hard test dependencies

* Added TESTS.md

Env/cleanup rollup (#62)

* Cleaned up build process

* Platform fallback compromise

* Fix dependencies

Env/npm publish (#67)

Make Lightning publishable on npm registry.

Feature/es5 bundle (#97)

* Build Lightning ES5 bundle
* Added es5 version of lightning-inspect.
* Updated tests to support ES5

Update rollup and es5 config (#102)

* Update rollup to latest version
* Update es5 transpilation target to exclude more of modern features (object property shorthand, typeof operator, template literals)
Fixed urls, removed unnecessary comments from bundle.
Changed package name. Changed version to 2.0.0-rc.0.

Correctly identify the license of the package

Systems that scan license IDs expect standard license identifiers from [SPDX](https://spdx.org/licenses/). This also disambiguates between Apache-1.1 and Apache-2.0 and conforms with the [package.json documentation](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v7/configuring-npm/package-json#license).
Added changelog, release notes and bumped version to 2.7.0

TypeScript Support (#407)

* Initial commit of TypeScript types

* Add TypeDoc, a `types` namespace and fix all TypeDoc warnings, etc

TypeDoc's warnings helped detect unreachable types. This is
resolved now with the `types` namespace.

Various other things as well

* Fix tsd errors by refactoring Element type system

- This simplifies things for Component / Mixin authors
- Also fixes all the errors that existed before
- Still needs renames an type function documentation updates

* Fix two more tsd errors

* Remove ts-expect-error tests that aren't possible

* Remove reliance on Element / Component implementing the literal interfaces

* Add test case for inline literal element types

* Add callbacks, children documentation

* Full rename of Element/Component Literal to TemplateSpec

* Add getters/setters to TextTexture

* Add test

* Rename more "Literal" references. Fix ListComponent types

* ListComponent fixes

* Document core parts of ObjectList, make it more correctly generic

* More documentation

* Implement inline element templates

* Add more documentation

* Improve types and documentation for animations

* EventEmitter documentation

* Implement strongly typed EventEmitters

* Document and fix up Tools

* Move TimingFunction into TransitionSettings, other minor doc changes

* Fix doc link

* Fully type Stage and mostly document it. Still some documentation needed

* More types/fixes to fix issues in TMDB

* Make acceptable transition properties dynamic

* Fix up tsd tests and some documentation

* Improve ElementChildList documentation

* Component types and documentation

* Additional animation / transition docs. rename lng to Lightning in typedocs

* ElementType POC

* Split up ElementTypes from TemplateSpecType for ergonomics

* Loosen smooth/transition allowed property types

* Move Documentation type func to internalTypes

* Fix ReduceSpecificity

* Rename ElementTypes to Element.Config...

Also add Component.Config

* Fix ReduceSpecificity + add tests for it

* Element.patch tests / docs, plus fix errors

* Proper animations() support + tests

* animation() must return an Animation

* Update Element flex box documentation

* Texture documentaiton

* Starting application types

* More application typing / docs, reorganize types, type selector tests

* Fix spelling. TypeConfig members are no longer optional.

* Improve extendible components test

* Fire ancestors improvement component events test

* Signals work now

* Texture/TextTexture/Element/Stage tweaks and documentation coverage

* Texture: Rename Literal to Settings and create SettingsLoose type

* Add application options

* Remove unnecessary implements

* Application tests

* Animation types and documentation. Stop methods documented.

* More types (mostly Transition/TransitionSettings/Animation/ImageTexture) and docs

* Stage Options: Add documentation and also forceTxCanvasSource

* Clean up comments

* Texture fixes

* Add key handlers and ability to augment them

* Add forgotten release key handlers

* Add getDrawingCanvas() from the stage

* Add Component state machine support and tests

* Turn on tsconfig noImplicitOverride for better testing of override existance

* Fix loose texture requirements

* Fix up textures and shaders a bit more. Add sample tests

* Move shader source strings from DefaultShader to WebGLShader

* Clean up

* Improve ImplementsTemplateSpec

* Animation type force literals

* Fix Element.add(), remove sky specific things

* Comment tweaks

* Add copywrite notices

* Revert all unintended mjs changes

* Added back Component.NewPatchTemplate as TMDB needs it

* Remove lightning inspect

* Add documentation on ARGB

* Rename 'helper' d.ts files to 'namespace' d.ts

* Changes forgotten from last commit

* Mark certain types as internal and remove from public namespaces

* Rename TemplateSpecStrong to TemplateSpec for brevity

* Fix documentation on TemplateSpec

* Add tag() support!

* package.json: Update exports to include both ESM and CommonJS entry points/types

* Documentation fixes

* Clean up typedoc warnings
Updated change log and bumped version to 2.7.1
Bumped version to 2.8.0 and updated changelog based on comments
Integrate Vite and Vitest. Add test for TextTextureRendererUtils.

Merge pull request #435 from frank-weindel/fix/package-json-exports-ts

Fix package.json exports

Enable TypeScript source files / Export all module files individually from `dist`

- Both TypeScript and JavaScript may now be used to develop Lightning
  - `index.js` and `src/textures/TextTextureRendererUtils.mjs` were converted
- Copy/Compile all source module files to the `dist` directory
  - JavaScript source files + Manual TypeScript definition files are copied over
  - TypeScript source files are compiled with `tsc` into the `dist`
  - The module files in `dist` are exported via package.json instead of fully bundled file
    - This fixes #490 to allow users to selectively import / tree shake the Lightning

Upgrade rollup and remove rollup-plugin-license

Fix up some types in vite.config.js
Add inspector build, fix up typescript defs, clean up unnecessary things
Updated changelog and package.json for v2.10.0

Rename `devtools` package export to `inspector`...

Also...
- point the export for CommonJS to the ES6 code
- Add license headers
- Removed redundant inspector.d.mts

Merge pull request #498 from rdkcentral/feat/allow-typescript-copy-src-to-dist

Enable TypeScript source files / Tree shakeable named exports
updated typedoc version to 0.23.21 to avoid conflicts with typescript package
bumped version to 2.12.0 for the October 2023 release

Fix builds on Windows.

The npm scripts where relying on shell type of commands (rm/cp etc) and have been abstracted by the SHX package.

Additionally there are environment variables set that are not supported on powershell, cross-env solves that.

Lastly the src-to-dist.sh shell script doesn't work very well on power shell. So this has been replaced with a .cjs node script using ShellJS.
bumped version to 2.12.1 and updated the changelog
bumped version to 2.13.0 for the release
